duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in engineering to support call recording (audio and screen) within the Genesys Platform.
Demonstrate an understanding of core CIC architecture, switchover processes, and upgrade procedures.
Design and implement interaction flows in Interaction Attendant.
Design and implement customizations in Interaction Designer.
Utilize and understand workforce management and speech analytics concepts.
Engage in hands-on coding and development.

education_certification.credential: BA, BS or equivalent experience in related field preferred. Advanced Degree may be required.
